title: Alone In The Dark 1-2-3(Original DOS)
description:
Hello retro gamers. Presenting to you, the grand-daddy of all horror games, the original Alone In The Dark Series. 
Contents
Alone In The Dark 1
Jack In The Dark (Teaser mini game before Alone In The Dark 2)
Alone In The Dark 2
Alone In The Dark 3

Please remember: These are NOT GOG version, instead these are the original DOS versions. If you want GOG version, there are other torrents of the same in TPB. Jack In The Dark is missing and size is bloated at least 20 times in the GOG version. 

Why Create This torrent?
I am fully aware that these games are abandonware but finding them and downloading them took me two hours. Either they ask for payment, like Abandonia, or those scary survey forms must be filled. Attempts to install spyware are there as well. Here you get clean and tested files with no bullshit.

Installation:
Like always, Windows users need DOSBOX + DFEND Reloaded
Linux users need DOSBOX + DBGL 

Enjoy and wet your pants mate!
